translations: 推广，普及；使……通俗化（等于 popularize）；使……受欢迎

sentences.sentence: Global institutions such as the World Bank and the World Economic Forum have helped to popularise entrepreneurialism.
sentences.translation: 世界银行、世界经济论坛这样的全球性机构，都力挺企业主义的兴起。

sentences.sentence: Mitsubishi Motors was one of the first to popularise the use of balance shafts in straight-four engines built from the 1970s onwards.
sentences.translation: 在19世纪70年代前所制造的直列四缸引擎中三菱引擎就是第一个推广平衡轴的使用的。
